entry.title: STORM SURGE WARNING , Baie-Comeau
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:20 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -2.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Baie-Comeau Airport 12:48 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -2.2°C
Pressure: 101.9 kPa
Visibility: 9.7 km
Humidity: 82 %
Wind Chill: -11
Dewpoint: -4.9°C
Wind: E 52 km/h gust 85 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow at times heavy and blowing snow beginning early this afternoon. Amount 10 to 20 cm. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60 increasing to 70 gusting to 100 this afternoon. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 12 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Snow at times heavy or rain. Temperature rising to plus 4 by morning.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow changing to rain after midnight. Snowfall amount 10 to 20 cm. Wind east 70 km/h gusting to 100 becoming southwest 50 gusting to 80 before morning. Temperature rising to plus 4 by morning. Wind chill minus 11 this evening. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 2 in the morning then steady. POP 40%
entry.summary: Flurries ending in the morning then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 70. Temperature falling to minus 2 in the morning then steady. Wind chill minus 12 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022
